subject: Some FM stuff.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
The comet thing kinda scary, it didn't come as close as "they" hoped,
whoever "they" are, so now they have to fake something, maybe this event
that was supposed to happen in May or October.

F-S

The come hing kinda sca y, i didn' come as close as " hey" hoped,  whoe e " hey" a e, so now hey ha e o ake some hing, maybe his e en ha was supposed o happen in May o Oc obe .

 
F-S
